thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com
thread.title: STEPHANIE MARKWALTER

author: STEPHANIE MARKWALTER
title: STEPHANIE MARKWALTER
text: I honestly was hesitant to order contacts from an online company and had read some poor reviews... However, my experience was great! The order process was straight forward and very easy. It was easy to get my prescription to OptiContacts as they offer several options for that. My order was accurate and arrived promptly... much sooner than I expected. Not to mention they saved me over $50!
